cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the robustness of the Chinese Remainder Theorem, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a method for grouping moduli, which involves concepts from discrete mathematics (cs.DS) and optimization (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the application of the robust CRT in signal processing (cs.SI).
